intro.title: About Middle Path
intro.content: Middle Path helps us move away from black-and-white thinking and embrace the idea that opposing truths can coexist. It is the foundation of dialectical thinkingâ€”considering the 'both/and' rather than the 'either/or.'

exercises.title: Recognizing Dialectical Dilemmas
exercises.description: Write down a situation where you feel stuck in 'either/or' thinking. Identify the extremes and explore how both might hold some truth.

exercises.title: Acceptance & Change
exercises.description: Write down a challenging situation. What parts do you need to accept as they are? What parts can you change? Write down actionable steps for both.

conclusion.title: Embrace the Middle Path
conclusion.content: Middle Path invites us to move beyond rigid thinking and embrace the complexity of life. It's not about choosing one side over the other; it's about finding wisdom in the tension between them.
